/* Sass (SCSS) */

.ghost {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  margin: 10px;


  .blinky {
    color: red;
  }

  .clyde {
    color: orange;
    margin: 20px
  }
}



/* CSS */

.ghost {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  margin: 10px;
}

.ghost .blinky {
  color: red;
}

.ghost .clyde {
  color: orange;
  margin: 20px
}




/* Nested CSS */

.ghost {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  margin: 10px;


  .blinky {
    color: red;
  }

  .clyde {
    color: orange;
    margin: 20px
  }
}
